bard.name: Blade Ward
bard.description: You extend your hand and trace a sigil of warding in the air. Until the end of your next turn, you have resistance against bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage dealt by weapon attacks.

bard.name: Dancing Lights
bard.description: You create up to four torch-sized lights within range, making them appear as torches, lanterns, or glowing orbs that hover in the air for the duration.

bard.name: Friends
bard.description: For the duration, you have advantage on all Charisma checks directed at one creature of your choice that isn't hostile toward you.

bard.name: Light
bard.description: You touch one object that is no larger than 10 feet in any dimension. Until the spell ends, the object sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet.

bard.name: Mage Hand
bard.description: A spectral, floating hand appears at a point you choose within range. The hand can manipulate an object, open an unlocked door or container, stow or retrieve an item from an open container, or pour the contents out of a vial.

bard.name: Mending
bard.description: This spell repairs a single break or tear in an object you touch, such as a broken chain link, two halves of a broken key, a torn cloak, or a leaking wineskin.

bard.name: Message
bard.description: You point your finger toward a creature within range and whisper a message. The target (and only the target) hears the message and can reply in a whisper that only you can hear.

bard.name: Minor Illusion
bard.description: You create a sound or an image of an object within range that lasts for the duration.

bard.name: Prestidigitation
bard.description: This spell is a minor magical trick that novice spellcasters use for practice. You create one of several minor effects.

bard.name: Thunderclap
bard.description: You create a burst of thunderous sound that can be heard up to 100 feet away. Each creature within range, other than you, must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or take 1d6 thunder damage.

bard.name: True Strike
bard.description: You extend your hand and point a finger at a target in range. Your magic grants you a brief insight into the target's defenses. On your next turn, you gain advantage on your first attack roll against the target.

bard.name: Vicious Mockery
bard.description: You unleash a string of insults laced with subtle enchantments at a creature you can see within range. If the target can hear you, it must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or take 1d4 psychic damage and have disadvantage on the next attack roll it makes before the end of its next turn.

cleric.name: Guidance
cleric.description: You touch one willing creature. Once before the spell ends, the target can roll a d4 and add the number rolled to one ability check of its choice. It can roll the die before or after making the ability check.

cleric.name: Light
cleric.description: You touch one object that is no larger than 10 feet in any dimension. Until the spell ends, the object sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet.

cleric.name: Mending
cleric.description: This spell repairs a single break or tear in an object you touch, such as a broken chain link, two halves of a broken key, a torn cloak, or a leaking wineskin.

cleric.name: Resistance
cleric.description: You touch one willing creature. Once before the spell ends, the target can roll a d4 and add the number rolled to one saving throw of its choice. It can roll the die before or after making the saving throw.

cleric.name: Sacred Flame
cleric.description: Flame-like radiance descends on a creature that you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take 1d8 radiant damage. The target gains no benefit from cover for this saving throw.

cleric.name: Spare the Dying
cleric.description: You touch a living creature that has 0 hit points. The creature becomes stable. This spell has no effect on undead or constructs.

cleric.name: Thaumaturgy
cleric.description: You manifest a minor wonder, a sign of supernatural power. You create one of several effects within range.

cleric.name: Toll the Dead
cleric.description: You point at one creature you can see within range, and the sound of a dolorous bell fills the air around it for a moment. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or take 1d8 necrotic damage. If the target is missing any of its hit points, it instead takes 1d12 necrotic damage.

cleric.name: Word of Radiance
cleric.description: You utter a divine word, and burning radiance erupts from you. Each creature of your choice that you can see within range must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or take 1d6 radiant damage.

druid.name: Druidcraft
druid.description: Whispering to the spirits of nature, you create one of several minor effects.

druid.name: Guidance
druid.description: You touch one willing creature. Once before the spell ends, the target can roll a d4 and add the number rolled to one ability check of its choice.

druid.name: Mending
druid.description: This spell repairs a single break or tear in an object you touch.

druid.name: Poison Spray
druid.description: You extend your hand toward a creature you can see within range and project a puff of noxious gas from your palm. The creature must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or take 1d12 poison damage.

druid.name: Produce Flame
druid.description: A flickering flame appears in your hand. The flame remains there for the duration and harms neither you nor your equipment. It sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet.

druid.name: Resistance
druid.description: You touch one willing creature. Once before the spell ends, the target can roll a d4 and add the number rolled to one saving throw of its choice.

druid.name: Shillelagh
druid.description: The wood of a club or quarterstaff you are holding is imbued with nature's power. For the duration, you can use your spellcasting ability instead of Strength for the attack and damage rolls of melee attacks using that weapon, and the weapon's damage die becomes a d8.

druid.name: Thorn Whip
druid.description: You create a long, vine-like whip covered in thorns that lashes out at your command toward a creature in range. Make a melee spell attack against the target. If the attack hits, the creature takes 1d6 piercing damage, and if the creature is Large or smaller, you pull the creature up to 10 feet closer to you.

sorcerer.name: Acid Splash
sorcerer.description: You hurl a bubble of acid. Choose one creature within range, or choose two creatures within range that are within 5 feet of each other. A target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take 1d6 acid damage.

sorcerer.name: Blade Ward
sorcerer.description: You extend your hand and trace a sigil of warding in the air. Until the end of your next turn, you have resistance against bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage dealt by weapon attacks.

sorcerer.name: Chill Touch
sorcerer.description: You create a ghostly, skeletal hand in the space of a creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the creature to assail it with the chill of the grave. On a hit, the target takes 1d8 necrotic damage, and it can't regain hit points until the start of your next turn.

sorcerer.name: Dancing Lights
sorcerer.description: You create up to four torch-sized lights within range, making them appear as torches, lanterns, or glowing orbs that hover in the air for the duration.

sorcerer.name: Fire Bolt
sorcerer.description: You hurl a mote of fire at a creature or object within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes 1d10 fire damage. A flammable object hit by this spell ignites if it isn't being worn or carried.

sorcerer.name: Friends
sorcerer.description: For the duration, you have advantage on all Charisma checks directed at one creature of your choice that isn't hostile toward you.

sorcerer.name: Light
sorcerer.description: You touch one object that is no larger than 10 feet in any dimension. Until the spell ends, the object sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet.

sorcerer.name: Mage Hand
sorcerer.description: A spectral, floating hand appears at a point you choose within range.

sorcerer.name: Mending
sorcerer.description: This spell repairs a single break or tear in an object you touch.

sorcerer.name: Message
sorcerer.description: You point your finger toward a creature within range and whisper a message.

sorcerer.name: Minor Illusion
sorcerer.description: You create a sound or an image of an object within range that lasts for the duration.

sorcerer.name: Poison Spray
sorcerer.description: You extend your hand toward a creature you can see within range and project a puff of noxious gas from your palm. The creature must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or take 1d12 poison damage.

sorcerer.name: Prestidigitation
sorcerer.description: This spell is a minor magical trick that novice spellcasters use for practice.

sorcerer.name: Ray of Frost
sorcerer.description: A frigid beam of blue-white light streaks toward a creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, it takes 1d8 cold damage, and its speed is reduced by 10 feet until the start of your next turn.

sorcerer.name: Shocking Grasp
sorcerer.description: Lightning springs from your hand to deliver a shock to a creature you try to touch. Make a melee spell attack against the target. You have advantage on the attack roll if the target is wearing armor made of metal. On a hit, the target takes 1d8 lightning damage, and it can't take reactions until the start of its next turn.

sorcerer.name: True Strike
sorcerer.description: Your magic grants you a brief insight into the target's defenses. On your next turn, you gain advantage on your first attack roll against the target.

warlock.name: Blade Ward
warlock.description: You extend your hand and trace a sigil of warding in the air. Until the end of your next turn, you have resistance against bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage dealt by weapon attacks.

warlock.name: Chill Touch
warlock.description: You create a ghostly, skeletal hand in the space of a creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the creature to assail it with the chill of the grave.

warlock.name: Eldritch Blast
warlock.description: A beam of crackling energy streaks toward a creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes 1d10 force damage. The spell creates more than one beam when you reach higher levels: two beams at 5th level, three beams at 11th level, and four beams at 17th level.

warlock.name: Friends
warlock.description: For the duration, you have advantage on all Charisma checks directed at one creature of your choice that isn't hostile toward you.

warlock.name: Mage Hand
warlock.description: A spectral, floating hand appears at a point you choose within range.

warlock.name: Minor Illusion
warlock.description: You create a sound or an image of an object within range that lasts for the duration.

warlock.name: Poison Spray
warlock.description: You extend your hand toward a creature you can see within range and project a puff of noxious gas from your palm. The creature must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or take 1d12 poison damage.

warlock.name: Prestidigitation
warlock.description: This spell is a minor magical trick that novice spellcasters use for practice.

warlock.name: True Strike
warlock.description: Your magic grants you a brief insight into the target's defenses.

wizard.name: Acid Splash
wizard.description: You hurl a bubble of acid. Choose one creature within range, or choose two creatures within range that are within 5 feet of each other. A target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take 1d6 acid damage.

wizard.name: Blade Ward
wizard.description: You extend your hand and trace a sigil of warding in the air. Until the end of your next turn, you have resistance against bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage dealt by weapon attacks.

wizard.name: Dancing Lights

wizard.name: Mage Hand
wizard.description: A spectral, floating hand appears at a point you choose within range.

wizard.name: Mending
wizard.description: This spell repairs a single break or tear in an object you touch.

wizard.name: Message
wizard.description: You point your finger toward a creature within range and whisper a message.

wizard.name: Minor Illusion
wizard.description: You create a sound or an image of an object within range that lasts for the duration.

wizard.name: Poison Spray
wizard.description: You extend your hand toward a creature you can see within range and project a puff of noxious gas from your palm. The creature must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or take 1d12 poison damage.

wizard.name: Prestidigitation
wizard.description: This spell is a minor magical trick that novice spellcasters use for practice.

wizard.name: Ray of Frost
wizard.description: A frigid beam of blue-white light streaks toward a creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, it takes 1d8 cold damage, and its speed is reduced by 10 feet until the start of your next turn.

wizard.name: Shocking Grasp
wizard.description: Lightning springs from your hand to deliver a shock to a creature you try to touch.

wizard.name: True Strike
wizard.description: Your magic grants you a brief insight into the target's defenses.

artificer.name: Acid Splash
artificer.description: You hurl a bubble of acid. Choose one creature within range, or choose two creatures within range that are within 5 feet of each other. A target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take 1d6 acid damage.

artificer.name: Create Bonfire
artificer.description: You create a bonfire on ground that you can see within range. Any creature in the bonfire's space when you cast the spell must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take 1d8 fire damage. A creature must also make the saving throw when it moves into the bonfire's space for the first time on a turn or ends its turn there.

artificer.name: Dancing Lights
artificer.description: You create up to four torch-sized lights within range, making them appear as torches, lanterns, or glowing orbs that hover in the air for the duration.

artificer.name: Fire Bolt
artificer.description: You hurl a mote of fire at a creature or object within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes 1d10 fire damage. A flammable object hit by this spell ignites if it isn't being worn or carried.

artificer.name: Frostbite
artificer.description: You cause numbing frost to form on one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 1d6 cold damage, and it has disadvantage on the next weapon attack roll it makes before the end of its next turn.

artificer.name: Guidance
artificer.description: You touch one willing creature. Once before the spell ends, the target can roll a d4 and add the number rolled to one ability check of its choice. It can roll the die before or after making the ability check.

artificer.name: Light
artificer.description: You touch one object that is no larger than 10 feet in any dimension. Until the spell ends, the object sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet.

artificer.name: Mage Hand
artificer.description: A spectral, floating hand appears at a point you choose within range. The hand can manipulate an object, open an unlocked door or container, stow or retrieve an item from an open container, or pour the contents out of a vial.

artificer.name: Magic Stone
artificer.description: You touch one to three pebbles and imbue them with magic. You or someone else can make a ranged spell attack with one of the pebbles by throwing it or hurling it with a sling. If thrown, a pebble has a range of 60 feet. On a hit, the target takes 1d6 + your spellcasting ability modifier bludgeoning damage. Whether the attack hits or misses, the spell then ends on the stone.

artificer.name: Mending
artificer.description: This spell repairs a single break or tear in an object you touch, such as a broken chain link, two halves of a broken key, a torn cloak, or a leaking wineskin.

artificer.name: Message
artificer.description: You point your finger toward a creature within range and whisper a message. The target (and only the target) hears the message and can reply in a whisper that only you can hear.

artificer.name: Poison Spray
artificer.description: You extend your hand toward a creature you can see within range and project a puff of noxious gas from your palm. The creature must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or take 1d12 poison damage.

artificer.name: Prestidigitation
artificer.description: This spell is a minor magical trick that novice spellcasters use for practice. You create one of several minor effects.

artificer.name: Ray of Frost
artificer.description: A frigid beam of blue-white light streaks toward a creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, it takes 1d8 cold damage, and its speed is reduced by 10 feet until the start of your next turn.

artificer.name: Resistance
artificer.description: You touch one willing creature. Once before the spell ends, the target can roll a d4 and add the number rolled to one saving throw of its choice. It can roll the die before or after making the saving throw.

artificer.name: Shocking Grasp
artificer.description: Lightning springs from your hand to deliver a shock to a creature you try to touch. Make a melee spell attack against the target. You have advantage on the attack roll if the target is wearing armor made of metal. On a hit, the target takes 1d8 lightning damage, and it can't take reactions until the start of its next turn.

artificer.name: Spare the Dying
artificer.description: You touch a living creature that has 0 hit points. The creature becomes stable. This spell has no effect on undead or constructs.

artificer.name: Thorn Whip
artificer.description: You create a long, vine-like whip covered in thorns that lashes out at your command toward a creature in range. Make a melee spell attack against the target. If the attack hits, the creature takes 1d6 piercing damage, and if the creature is Large or smaller, you pull the creature up to 10 feet closer to you.

artificer.name: Thunderclap
artificer.description: You create a burst of thunderous sound that can be heard up to 100 feet away. Each creature within range, other than you, must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or take 1d6 thunder damage.
